title: Global mine production of asbestos 2007 to 2019
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Production in thousand metric tons, containing a total of 13 data points.
Overall Production in thousand metric tons has decreased over the Year.
Production in thousand metric tons is roughly constant from 2007 to 2015, gradually decreasing from 2015 to 2017, roughly constant from 2017 to 2018, and finally roughly decreasing from 2018 to 2019.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2015 and 2016.
The highest Production in thousand metric tons, of value 2200.0 was reached at Year 2007
The lowest Production in thousand metric tons, of value 1100.0 was reported at Year 2019
